title: What is the most unbelievable fact about gender? - Quora

response.answer_text: That our Western construct of Male Female as dichotomous categories isn't universal. In many other cultures, there are more than to genders and they don't necessarily assign to genitalia and the categories are not as strict and rigid as ours have been for so long.

What is the most unbelievable fact about gender? Between ages 55 and 60 it goes away, and you become just a normal human being. Male or female is of no consequence. You just go on being the person you have become.
